import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import Modal from '../Utils/Modal' function ViewListBlog({blog,deletePost, showModal, setShowModal}) { const isConfirm = () =>{ deletePost(blog._id) } return (<>
Title: {blog.title}

Description: {blog.description}

Edit {/* Delete Modal */}
{showModal && } ) } export default ViewListBlog
